notFound.title: Oops, page not found!
notFound.desc: It looks like you took a wrong turn… The page you're looking for escaped, like a cat refusing to be caught! 🐾 Don't panic, you can go back to the homepage or hunt for the info elsewhere!

unauthorized.title: Oops! You tried to enter the forbidden zone…
unauthorized.desc: Sorry, you don't have the keys for this secret door! 🚪 If you think it's an error, contact our awesome tech team, otherwise… maybe a coffee will help you get back on track! ☕

header.noResult: Mission impossible! 🏽‍♂️ No trace of what you're looking for... It's like looking for a needle in a haystack, but without the haystack. Try again? 😅
